Title: Price Only
Description: The award will be made to the qualified bid with the lowest price.

Title: Cost Only
Description: The award will be made to the qualified bid demonstrating the lowest overall cost. A cost assessment could cover the entire monetary implications of the proposal, including the price paid to the supplier and the running costs, switching costs or other non-price costs of choosing a particular option.

Title: Quality Only
Description: The award will be made to the qualified bid demonstrating the highest quality against some assessment method. The price is either fixed, or with a maximum set and price factors not included in the evaluation.

Title: Rated Criteria
Description: The award will be made to the qualified bid demonstrating the highest score against a set of weighted criteria such as price, cost and quality (including, for example, the environmental and social impact of the procurement). Structured information on individual qualifying criteria can be provided with the requirements extension.
